meanings.definition: To arrange a new mortgage on a property that has an existing mortgage.
meanings.sent1: They remortgaged their house to get a better deal on their loan.
meanings.sent2: After considering their options, they decided to remortgage their home.
meanings.sent3: The couple remortgaged their house and felt like financial wizards.
meanings.sent4: She remortgaged her property, exchanging old debts for new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Remortgaging their home opened up a world of financial possibilities.
